events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking status hasn't updated in days, and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The system has categorized the reported problem as a Delivery Delay based on keywords related to late shipment and tracking issues stated by the customer.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle this delivery delay case to provide appropriate assistance and updates regarding the shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your concern about the delayed delivery, and I’m here to help resolve this issue for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and any tracking information you have? This will help me investigate the delay with the shipping carrier.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking number is ZX987654321, but the tracking status hasn’t updated since last week.
I’ve contacted the shipping carrier to expedite your package and requested a status update. We expect to have more information within 24 hours and will keep you informed.
Thank you for checking on that so quickly. I appreciate you keeping me updated and hope to get the package soon.
The shipping carrier confirmed the package was delayed due to a transit issue but has now been dispatched and should arrive within two days. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to confirm that your package has arrived. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you need any further assistance.
Since the issue appears resolved and no further questions were raised, we have closed this case. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need additional support.
